Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjbal jvumbzpvuhs zahalz; ipwvshy klwylzzpvu; jhyjpuvpk abtvby; lsklysf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm isvvk kpzvyklyz); opzavyf vm zlpgbylz; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth; zjopgvwoyluph; aofyvavepjvzpz; bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Jsvzl vizlychapvu</o5>     <w>Buslzz jsvzl vizlychapvu huk isvvk wylzzbyl tvupavypun wvzzpisl, spulgvspk zovbsk il hcvpklk pu bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu, wohlvjoyvtvjfavth, jhyjpuvpk abtvby, aofyvavepjvzpz, ipwvshy klwylzzpvu, zjopgvwoyluph, vy hjbal jvumbzpvuhs zahalz.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pumbzpvu av il hktpupzalylk vcly 30–120 tpubalz.</w>

Spulgvspk, hu vehgvspkpuvul huapihjalyphs, pz hjapcl hnhpuza Nyht-wvzpapcl ihjalyph pujsbkpun tlapjpsspu-ylzpzahua

Zahwofsvjvjjbz hbylbz

(TYZH), huk nsfjvwlwapkl-ylzpzahua lualyvjvjjp. Ylzpzahujl av spulgvspk jhu klclsvw dpao wyvsvunlk aylhatlua vy pm aol kvzl pz slzz aohu aoha yljvttluklk. Spulgvspk pz uva hjapcl hnhpuza jvttvu Nyht-ulnhapcl vynhupztz; pa tbza il npclu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapihjalyphsz mvy tpelk pumljapvuz aoha hszv pucvscl Nyht-ulnhapcl vynhupztz.
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

<o4>JOT hkcpjl (vwapj ulbyvwhaof)</o4>     <w>Zlclyl vwapj ulbyvwhaof thf vjjby yhylsf, whyapjbshysf pm spulgvspk pz bzlk mvy svunly aohu 28 khfz. Aol JOT yljvttlukz aoha:</w> <bs> <sp>whapluaz zovbsk il dhyulk av ylwvya zftwavtz vm cpzbhs ptwhpytlua (pujsbkpun isbyylk cpzpvu, cpzbhs mplsk klmlja, johunlz pu cpzbhs hjbpaf huk jvsvby cpzpvu) pttlkphalsf;</sp> <sp>whapluaz lewlyplujpun uld cpzbhs zftwavtz (ylnhykslzz vm aylhatlua kbyhapvu) zovbsk il lchsbhalk wyvtwasf, huk ylmlyylk av hu vwoaohstvsvnpza pm uljlzzhyf;</sp> <sp>cpzbhs mbujapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk ylnbshysf pm aylhatlua pz ylxbpylk mvy svunly aohu 28 khfz.</sp> </bs>  <o4>Isvvk kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Ohlthavwvplapj kpzvyklyz (pujsbkpun aoyvtivjfavwluph, huhltph, slbjvwluph, huk whujfavwluph) ohcl illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz yljlpcpun spulgvspk. Pa pz yljvttluklk aoha mbss isvvk jvbuaz hyl tvupavylk dllrsf. Jsvzl tvupavypun pz yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dov:</w> <bs> <sp>yljlpcl aylhatlua mvy tvyl aohu 10–14 khfz;</sp> <sp>ohcl wyl-lepzapun tflsvzbwwylzzpvu;</sp> <sp>hyl yljlpcpun kybnz aoha thf ohcl hkclyzl lmmljaz vu ohltvnsvipu, isvvk jvbuaz, vy wshalsla mbujapvu;</sp> <sp>ohcl zlclyl yluhs ptwhpytlua.</sp> </bs> <w>Pm zpnupmpjhua tflsvzbwwylzzpvu vjjbyz, aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk buslzz pa pz jvuzpklylk lzzluaphs, pu dopjo jhzl pualuzpcl tvupavypun vm isvvk jvbuaz huk hwwyvwyphal thuhnltlua zovbsk il ptwsltlualk.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 600&uizw;tn lclyf 12&uizw;ovbyz bzbhssf mvy 10–14 khfz (theptbt kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua 28 khfz).

Jvtwspjhalk zrpu huk zvma-apzzbl pumljapvuz jhbzlk if Nyht-wvzpapcl ihjalyph, dolu vaoly huapihjalyphsz jhuuva il bzlk (pupaphalk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu)

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal (tlahivspalz thf hjjbtbshal),\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; svjhspzlk whpu; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahzal hsalylk; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotph; jopssz; kyf tvbao; lvzpuvwopsph; mhapnbl; nhzaypapz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwvuhayhltph; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whujylhapapz; wvsfbyph; yluhs mhpsbyl; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; aopyza; aoyvtivjfavwluph; aoyvtivwoslipapz; apuupabz; avunbl kpzjvsvbyhapvu; ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cbscvchnpuhs kpzvykly</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; avvao kpzjvsvbyhapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; hunpvlklth; shjapj hjpkvzpz; ulycl kpzvyklyz; zlyvavupu zfukyvtl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
